verses.name: Numbers 34:18
verses.text: And ye shall take one prince of every tribe, to divide the land by inheritance.

verses.name: Numbers 34:19
verses.text: And the names of the men are these: Of the tribe of Judah, Caleb the son of Jephunneh.

verses.name: Numbers 34:20
verses.text: And of the tribe of the children of Simeon, Shemuel the son of Ammihud.

verses.name: Numbers 34:21
verses.text: Of the tribe of Benjamin, Elidad the son of Chislon.

verses.name: Numbers 34:22
verses.text: And the prince of the tribe of the children of Dan, Bukki the son of Jogli.

verses.name: Numbers 34:23
verses.text: The prince of the children of Joseph, for the tribe of the children of Manasseh, Hanniel the son of Ephod.
